name: web-app.toml

platform.name: Web Application
platform.description: Main customer-facing web application with public and authenticated areas

rawContent:
# Web Application Platform
# Main customer-facing web application

[platform]
id = "web-app"
name = "Web Application"
type = "web"
description = "Main customer-facing web application with public and authenticated areas"

[platform.config]
baseRoute = "/app"
theme = "default"

[relations]
routes = ["home", "dashboard", "profile", "settings"]
roles = ["visitor", "user", "admin"]
guards = ["public", "authenticated"]
